website_summaries.verdict: This revitalizing shampoo uses advanced thickening solutions to strengthen and replenish fine or limp hair.
pros: Cell-U-Plex pure plant extracts combine with caffeine to strengthen hair
A little goes a long way
Designed for both men and women
cons: Some have said it made their hair feel dry

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: My wife has gradual thinning hair, and swears by this product. She's tried many other options, and says this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Achilles

customer_reviews.title: Love this Change!
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 and have a mix of gray hair and baby fine dark hair. This shampoo has been a life changer! Love the scent and the way the texture of my hair has improved in just a few weeks! Just having more manageable hair would have been a plus but I also have been able to cut back on styling products. I also use the Thicker Fuller Serum - makes a great combo for problem hair. Great value also.
customer_reviews.author: Betty N.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this shampoo!!!! Fine hair- you met your match!
customer_reviews.text: I have thinning baby fine hair - and I have gone through and literally poured money down my bathroom drain trying to find a shampoo that actually plumps up my hair- all you women with my type of hair know exactly what I am talking about! I LOVE this shampoo! I have spent much more money on shampoo that did nothing. I do use a shampoo for scalp health 3 times a week- but this is MY shampoo when I want to make sure I feel confident with my hair !!! I will use forever!
customer_reviews.author: Salt/pepper

customer_reviews.title: Healthy scalp and hair
customer_reviews.text: I received this shampoo last week, so I used only a few times now, though I find this product very positive to the concerns I am recently having. When I use this shampoo, I lose far less hair at shower time, and I feel my hair clean and not oily for a few days, And my scalp is not itchy any more, and I feel it is in good condition. Going through menopause period, I started to notice that I am losing hair so much in these months, and I believe this shampoo will improve this situation better.
customer_reviews.author: anntky

customer_reviews.title: good product - works well - good price - arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: good product - works well - good price - arrived in timely manner - though one of the tops had opened and the package was full of shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Robert Watson

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair that does not hold a style
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair that does not hold a style. This shampoo gives my hair body & fullness so my style does hold thru the day. I won't use any other shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B L

customer_reviews.title: Great thickening shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt find in stores but found it here and so happy i did. Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T

customer_reviews.title: Is good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for years and I really like how I can manage my hair as I have thin and fine hair. Hopefully they will keep making it. I would feel sad if they quit.
customer_reviews.author: marcella renner

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, since it's been only few days I dont see my hair getting full yet.
customer_reviews.author: Varmint

customer_reviews.title: Thinning hair help
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is super for thinning hair, and the smell is "fresh" not artificial like.
customer_reviews.author: Medford Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole product line! It really helps my hair grow quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie webb

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product a little less than a month and I can definitely tell a difference. My hair has so much more volume now and it feels and looks healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my fine hair feeling thick and
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this shamp. Keeps my fine hair feeling thick and manageable
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alegado

customer_reviews.title: Fuller hair with body
customer_reviews.text: My significant other and I both have very fine hair. Discovered this shampoo helps to give our hair "life" and body.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simms-Ashbrook

customer_reviews.title: The volume perfect shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this shampoo since the last six months. Its amazing. My hair has body and stopped falling. I recommend it to everyone. Its cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Malikahpopal

customer_reviews.title: Top it off using there conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I’m 87 years old,and been using this product for at least 12 years. It works
customer_reviews.author: Donald Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. So sad that Walgreens isn’t carrying it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morris

customer_reviews.title: makes hair look fuller
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent shampoo. I had been buying it in the stores but I stopped being able to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and have recently reordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone i recommended this for is now hooked. Amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: Fero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product and fell in love with it but my local store stopped carrying it. I am so happy I found it again. My hair is fuller and has more body.
customer_reviews.author: MoonRaven49

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, excellent seller. this is the 4th time I buy from this seller. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: athina

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo all of a sudden was not available from my old source. It was quick and easy ordering from you and I received all just as I expected. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Murray III

customer_reviews.title: Overall healthier and more natural level of hair cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite a while and I always return to it as soon as I decide I want to try something else. Whether or not there is any reactivated hair growth is questionable, but I do feel like my hair feels better and fuller overall when i use this product. There is no flatness or film with this product that you will sometimes find in your hair after using other products. Overall, I feel like this is a very natural and healthy product for your hair, and I keep coming back to it.
customer_reviews.author: AB92

customer_reviews.title: Watch for bottles that leak.
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say I love this shampoo. The packaging (bottle) is different than what it used to be but hopefully it’s the same. That said, the seller really needs to find a way to keep the bottles sealed. When I opened the box, a whole bottle had leaked all over everything!! So I’m down one bottle. I think that next time I will try to find another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Imatexican

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Fine/Thin Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super fine & straight hair & use the shampoo, conditioner & styling gel. I can always tell a difference when I use just the shampoo. Even better results when I use all 3 as a system.
customer_reviews.author: CathyM

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts but it really is making my hair thicker.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for thin hair. After about a week of daily use my hair looks like hair and not fuzz :) For people on Rogain this is the missing piece of the puzzle as it makes the peach fuzz that rogain grows look like real hair and that in turn makes the area look like it has three times as much hair. My wife has already noticed the difference.
customer_reviews.author: RobbygTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: love the way my hair feels after washing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of years. love the way my hair feels after washing, so soft
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shampoo and we couldn’t buy it locally. So glad we could find this to order. My husband likes the way his hair feels when he uses this shampoo and how it makes his hair feel thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Josh11

customer_reviews.title: The very BEST shampoo on the planet!!
customer_reviews.text: The very BEST shampoo on the planet!! I have really baby fine hair and this gives me all the body I need!!
customer_reviews.author: Rugfitter

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair full! This is my go to shampoo from here in!!️🤗
customer_reviews.author: Liz1

customer_reviews.title: FAKE - NOT ORIGINAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the original product. It is a FAKE. Ingredients do NOT match what I have been buying for years. It doesn't work as well, but since bottle looks the same as original, did not compare ingredients until too late to return them. Do not buy if you liked the original.
customer_reviews.author: b white

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thinning on top.This shampoo gives it enough body to help me hide it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dickie

customer_reviews.title: Not what is says it will do
customer_reviews.text: It did not stand up to what they said. I bought the 3 bottles and used them all and My hair is NOT ANY THICKER then when I started with this shampoo. Very Disappointed. Will not use that product again.
customer_reviews.author: Alma York

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Almost the the same kind as flora marine complex shampoo. The other shampoo is out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Lsu3481

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Provides fullness while still allowing the user to work with his/her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: I used it for thinning hair and it makes my hair fuller.
customer_reviews.author: anita b riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair is so fine, this product gives it nice body. Not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I first found this shampoo years ago at a Pick and Save. I loved it, since I have always had baby fine hair. But, I never found it again, and figured it was discontinued, or was just an obscure, off brand that I would never find again. I was SO excited to see it as a recommendation on Amazon, and bought it without a second thought. This stuff is my holy grail, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLex

customer_reviews.title: Good for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shampoo. I've got thin and thinning hair, and it's the best I've found for making it look a bit less so.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is awesome for ppl with fine hair ty
customer_reviews.author: Janis B.

customer_reviews.title: Thicker hair- really!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is terrific. You can actually FEEL a thicker head of hair, after shampooing. Also has pleasant fragrance that doesn't compete with perfume. Wonderful THICKENING shampoo. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love it and has a very nice smell--not overbearing
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair so much thicker! Love it and has a very nice smell--not overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: lgmhex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. It is absolutely the best for fine hair
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shampoo for years
customer_reviews.text: I've tried some other brands that claim to make hair thicker and more manageable (including expensive "salon" brands) and none work as well as this. It's a shame that it's not in more stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Williams

customer_reviews.title: No Scare for Your Hair
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks that she does have thicker, fuller, revitalized hair. If she's happy I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur David Digby

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a week now and can feel the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week now and can feel the difference in my hair. It is natural so does not cause irritation. My hair feels clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo really dried my hair I stopped using it after about 2 weeks. Thumbs down for me...
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo really leaves you hair nice with a lot more body. This is my regular from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: ... thin hair and have used this for years and love it. Only shampoo I use
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and have used this for years and love it. Only shampoo I use. Feels much thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm switching over to something more natural like SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo has sulfates in it. It is NOT all natural as described. Makes my hair dry and brittle. I'm switching over to something more natural like SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Shampoo. Also note, this will burn your scalp if you leave it in too long.
customer_reviews.author: John H

product_meta.title: Thicker Fuller Hair Revitalizing Shampoo-12 oz (3 Bottles)
product_meta.description: Pure plant extracts. Thicken Strength Revive fine, limp, thin hair. For thicker, stronger hair. Energize lifeless hair with Revitalizing Shampoo. This invigorating, purifying shampoo helps to eliminate build-up from hair and scalp to encourage healthy hair growth. Leaves hair visibly thicker and fuller. Continued usage improves hair's thickness, texture and strength, without stripping essential oils. Designed for both men and women, Thicker Fuller Hair is formulated with Cell-U-Plex, a synergistic blend of pure plant extracts, vitamins and protein that infuse the hair shaft to thicken, improving hair's overall vigor. A.R.L. does not engage in animal testing.
feature_bullets: Thicken, Strengthen & Replenish Fine, Thin, Limp Hair
